messages.body: $AAPL i think it will move towards  $200 next and go to $204 before getting knocked back to
$AMD How big of a pop would it be to get some hard info on AMD designing custom CPUs for $AAPL ?  I think it's going to happen.
@MiguelWins SeekingAlpha also said $AAPL was done growing and was calling for $110 price targets a month ago and three months ago for $90

links.title: Fashology Breakout - Apple, LULU and Nike - Howard Lindzon
links.description: Happy Ramadan...or as us Jews like to say...a great month to go to our favorite middle eastern restaurants. To the markets... I get excited about stupid things. Today it is a big breakout confirmed in my 'fashology' part of the portfolio. Nike, LULU and Apple are all at all-time highs.
